definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: give, put, set (Ecclus [[נתן]] Sir 44:19 + oft.; OHeb. [[נתן־יהו]] n.pr.m. Lzb:327; NH = BH; Ph. [[יתן]], [[נתן]] in n.pr. [[מתנת]], etc., Lzb:292; Lzb:327; As. nadânu Dl:HWB 450 (rarely ittan Id:ib.488); Zinj. [[נתן]], also in n.pr., Lzb:327 Cook:84; Nab. Impf. [[ינתן]], also n.pr.; Palm., also n.pr. Lzb:l.c. Cook:l.c.; Targum Impf. [[יִתֵּן]], Inf. [[מִתַּן]]; Sab. [[נתן]] Hal:154, Liḥ n.pr. [[נחנבעל]] [North-Sem. form] DHM:Epigr. Denkm. 80, No.35; Chr Pal Aram. ntn (rare) Schwally:Idiot.58; Syr. Impf. netel, Inf. metal Lindberg:Vergl. Sem. Gram. 93 f., but Mand. [[נתן]] Nö:M 52);—
give:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: = give personally, deliver or hand to, c. acc. rei + [[ל]] pers. 1Sa 10:4, 1Sa 22:10, 2Ki 2:10, Le 5:16(P) Le 22:14 (H) Ru 4:7 + oft.; in trade Pr 31:24; [[אֶל־]] pers. Ge 21:14 (E), Je 3:8, Le 15:14 + oft.; explicitly [[בְּיַד]] ´[[נ]] De 24:1, De 24:3 (bill of divorce); c. acc. rei alone Ju Jdg 5:25.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: = bestow upon, c. acc. rei + [[ל]] pers. Ge 24:53 (J) Ge 20:16 (E) Ge 1:29 (P) + oft.; an understanding heart 1Ki 3:9, 1Ki 3:12, blessing De 12:15, merch De 13:18, cf. Je 16:13, Je 42:12; strength De 8:18, Ps 68:36; the sabbath Ex 16:29 (J) Ez Eze 20:12; = procure for ([[לְ]]) one 1Sa 17:10, 1Ki 21:7; [[יִתֵּן לֶכֶם רַחֲמִים לִפְנֵי]] Ge 43:14 (J) he will give you compassion in the eyes of the man (cf. also

definitions.title: 2b, 3b
definitions.body: ); give persons Ge 46:18, Ge 46:25 (P); of Levites given to ([[לְ]]) Aaron and his sons Nu 3:9 cf. Nu 8:19, to ´[[י]] Nu 8:16 cf. Nu 18:6 (all P); esp. of ´[[י]]'s giving land to Abr. and his descendants Ge 15:18, Ge 26:4 (J) Ge 17:8(P) Ex 6:8 (P; + [[מוֹרָשָׁה]]) + oft. (pt. in this sense 37 t. Dt.), + [[לִרִשְׁתָּהּ]] De 3:18 +; [[אַל־תִּתֵּן לַנׇּשִׁים חֵיֶלְֶָ]] Pr Pr 31:3; + [[מִן]] of source [[נׇתַתִּי מִמֶּנׇּה לְ ְבֵּן]] Ge 17:16 (P); c. acc. alone Ps 61:6, Ec 12:7 ([[רוּחַ]]); give something to ([[ל]]) one for ([[ל]]) sthg., in some capacity, [[לוֹ לַעֲבָּדִים]] ´[[אֶת־כָּל־אֶחָיו נ]] Ge 27:37 +; prob. also [[בְּבָרוּתִי ראׁשׁ]] ´[[נ]] Ps 69:22 they gave, as my food, gall ([[בְּ]] essentiae), cf. supr. [[בְּ]]

definitions.title: 7 c,
definitions.body: Hup-Now:ad loc.; acc. + inf. [[־לי לֶחֶם לָאֱכׂל]]´[[נ]] [[וּבֶגֶד לִלְבּשׁ]] Ge 28:20 (J), cf. Ex 16:15 (P), Ne 9:15, Ne 9:20; [[לָכֶם לֵב לָדַעַת וְעֵינַיִם לִרְאוֹת וְאָזְנַיִם]] ´[[לאׁ נ]] [[לִשְׁמׂעַ]] De 29:3. Esp.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: give woman to ([[ל]]) man as ([[ל]]) wife, Ge 29:28 (E), Ge 34:8, Ge 34:12 (J), Jos 15:16, Jos 15:17 (JE), = Ju Jdg 1:12, Jdg 1:13 +; without 2nd [[ל]] Ge 29:19, Ge 29:19 (E), Ge 38:21, Ex 2:21 (J), Ge 34:9, Ge 34:14, Ge 34:16 (P), Ju Jdg 15:2, Jdg 15:6 +; c. acc. alone, Ge 29:26 (E), 1Sa 25:44.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: of (gracious) bestowals of various kinds: give = grant, send rain, [[גִּשְׁמֵיכֶם]] Le 26:4 (H), [[מְטַר־אַרְחְכֶס]] De 11:14, [[עַל־אַרְחְ ְמָטָר]] 1Ki 8:36, etc.; also of sending plague of hail Ex 9:23 (E); send herbage ([[עֵשֶׂב]]) in ([[בְּ]]) your field for ([[לְ]]) your cattle De 11:15; grant a remnant to ([[לְ]]) Judah Je 40:11; [[וְנׇתַּתִּי לְ ְאֶת־]] [[נַפְשְׁ ְלְשָׁלָל]] Je 45:5 and I will grant thee thy life as spoil; grant revenge (acc.) to ([[לְ]]) the king on ([[מִן]]) Saul, etc. 2Sa 4:8, cf. [[הָאֵל הַנּׂתֵן נְקָמוֹת לִי]] 2Sa 22:48 = Ps 18:48; other gifts Ju Jdg 15:18 ([[בְּיַד]]), 1Sa 1:11 ([[לְ]]), Ru 4:13.

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: [[מִי יִתֵּן]] who will give or grant, in expressions of wish = O that (I had! etc.; = As. mannu inamdin Jäger:BAS ii.279), esp. (9 t.) Jb.: c. acc. [[מִי־יִתֵּן עֶרֶב]] De 28:67 cf. v:De 28:67, Job 14:4, Ps 14:7 = Ps 53:6, Ps 55:7, Je 9:1; c. 2 acc. [[נְבִּיאִים]] ´[[כָּל־עַם י]] Nu 11:29 (JE), lit. who will make all ´[[י]]'s people prophets? cf. Je 8:23; c. acc. + [[כְּ]], [[מִי יִתֶּנְ ְכְאָח לֵי]] Ct So 8:1, cf. Job 29:2; c. acc. + [[בְּ]], [[אֶת־הָעָם הַזֶּה בְּיׇדִי]] Ju Jdg 9:29 O that this people were in my charge! c. acc. + [[לְ]] Job 31:35, lit. who will give to me ([[לִי]]) one hearing me? also [[מִי יִהְּנֵנִי]] Is 27:4 where sf. appar. = [[לִי]]; c. inf. [[מִי יִתֵּן מוּתֵנוּ]] Ex 16:3 (P), so 2Sa 19:1, [[מִי יִתֵּן אֱלוֹהַּ דַּבֵּר]] Job 11:5; c. impf. [[תָּבוֹא]] [[שֶׁאֱלָתִי]] Job 6:8 O that my request might come to pass! Job 14:13, Job 31:31; impf. + [[וְ]] Job 19:23, Job 19:23; c. pf. [[יׇדַעְתִּי]] Job 23:3 O that I knew! (+ [[וְאֶמְחָאֵהוּ]]); c. pf. consec. De 5:26†.

definitions.title: g.
definitions.body: permit, c. acc. + inf., [[לאׁ־נְתַתִּי ְלִנְגּׁעַ]] [[אֵלֶיהָ]] Ge 20:6 (JE) + oft.; c. [[ל]] pers. + inf. 2Ch 20:10; other constructions are: ´[[לְ ְי]] ´[[לאׁ כֵן נ]] De 18:14 not thus hath ´[[י]] permitted to thee; ´[[אִם־אֶתֵּן שְׁנׇת לְעֵינׇ֑י וגו]] Ps 132:4, Pr 6:4; give thyself [[לְ]] no rest La 2:18, give him [[לְ]] no rest Is 62:6.

definitions.title: h.
definitions.body: = ascribe glory, etc. (acc.) to [[לְ]] God 1Sa 6:5, Job 36:3, esp. imv. Je 13:16, Ezr 10:11, Ps 68:35 cf. Ps 115:1 (so [[הָבוּ]], v. [[יהב]]
); to man 1Sa 18:8, 1Sa 18:8; unseemliness ([[תִּפְלָה]]) to God Job 1:22.

definitions.title: i.
definitions.body: = apply, devote heart to seek out, acc. + inf. Ec 1:13, Ec 1:17, Ec 8:9, Ec 8:16, Da 10:12, [[לֵב לְ]] ´[[נ]] Ec 7:21 = attend to; conversely [[אֶת־כָּל־זֶה נׇחַתִּי אֶל־לִבִּי]] Ec 9:1 = all this I set my mind, Ec 7:2; also (with subj. diff. fr. ind. obj.) [[מָה אֱלּהַי נׁתֵן אֶל־לִבִּי לַעֲשׂוֹת]] Ne 2:12 cf. Ne 7:5.

definitions.title: j.
definitions.body: = employ, devote money (acc.) [[עַל־עֲבׂדַת אׂהֶל מוֹעֵד]] Ex 30:16 (P).

definitions.title: k.
definitions.body: give offerings, ´[[לְי]] Nu 18:12 (P), ´[[תְּרוּמַת י]] Ex 30:15 (P), cf. give spoil to ([[לְ]]) ´[[י]]) De 20:14 (´[[י]] subj.); [[לָָח מִיׇּֽדְ ְנׇתַנּוּ]] 1Ch 29:14; offering to ([[לְ]]) idols Ez Eze 6:13; esp. to Moloch Le 20:2, Le 20:4, to pass through fire to ([[ל]]) M. Le 18:2, etc.

definitions.title: l.
definitions.body: = consecrate, dedicate to ([[לְ]]) ´[[י]] 1Sa 1:11, Ex 22:29 (E).

definitions.title: m.
definitions.body: give a sign or wonder, acc. 1Ki 13:3, 1Ki 13:5, + [[לְ]] pers. Jos 2:12 (JE), with reflex. [[לְ]] Ex 7:9 (P), alm. = display, exhibit; cf. [[נׇֽתְנוּ הֲדָרֵח]] Ez Eze 27:10 they set forth, exhibit thy splendour; [[כִּי יִתֵּן בַּכּוֹס עֵינוֹ]] Pr 23:31 when it sheweth its sparkle in the cup.

definitions.title: n.
definitions.body: = pay, wages (acc., + sf.), [[שְׂכָרִי]] ´[[נ]] Ge 30:18 (E) he hath paid my hire, Ex 2:9 (E) De 24:15, cf. Is 61:8; + [[ל]] pers. Je 22:13; a price, [[מִכְרָם]] ´[[נ]] Nu 20:19 (JE), [[וַיִּתֵּן שְׂכָרָהּ]] Jon 1:3, i.e. paid his fare, passage-money; money (as) price ([[מחיר]]) 1Ki 21:2, cf. [[כֶּסֶף הַשָּׂדֶה]] ´[[נ]] Ge 23:13 (P); pay money for ([[ב]]) something De 14:26; wealth for ([[ב]]) love Ct So 8:7; tax or rent, c. acc. rei + [[ל]] pers. Ge 47:24 (J); fine (c. id.) Ex 21:32 (E) De 22:29, acc. om. v:De 22:19, cf. [[וְנׇתַן בִּפְלִלִים]] Ex 21:22 (v. [[פָּלִיל]]), [[שִׁבְתּוֹ]] ´[[נ]] v:Ex 21:19 (i.e. pay for his lost time), [[פִּדְיוֹן נַפְשׁוֹ]] ´[[נ]] v:Ex 21:30 (pay redemption-money; all E), cf. ´[[אִישׁׂ כּׂפֶר נַפְשׁוֹ לְי]] ´[[וְנ]] Ex 30:12 (P); pay votive offering (c. acc. + [[ל]]) Le 27:23 (P); a wager (c. acc.+ [[ל]]) Ju Jdg 14:12, Jdg 14:13.

definitions.title: o.
definitions.body: c. [[בְּ]], give for ([[ב]]) money = sell, [[תְּנׇה־לִּי אֶת־כַּרְמְ ְבְּכֶסֶף]] 1Ki 21:6, cf. De 2:28, De 14:25, 1Ch 21:22; —´[[נ]] Ez Eze 27 is trading term, but sts. connexion obscure and text dub.: give wares for ([[בְ]]) Eze 27:12 (but rd. prob. [[ך]] for [[ב]] LXX SyrVer Co Berthol), v:Eze 27:13, v:Eze 27:16 (del. 2nd [[ב]]), v:Eze 27:17, v:Eze 27:19, v:Eze 27:22 (cf.. further, Co Berthol and esp. Sm); [[הַיֶּלֶדּ בַּזּוֹנׇךְ]] ´[[נ]] Joe 4:3 (‖[[מָכַר]]); [[ב]] instr., give [[בַּגּוֹרֶל]] by lot Jos 21:8.

definitions.title: p.
definitions.body: give instead of, exchange for, c. [[תַּחַת]] Ex 21:23 (E) 1Ki 21:2, 1Ki 21:6, Is 43:4, Is 61:3, [[בְּעַד]] Job 2:4.

definitions.title: q.
definitions.body: give, i.e. lend, at interest, [[בְּנֶשֶׁךְ]] ´[[כַּסְפּוֹ לאׁ נ]] Le 25:37, Ps 15:5, so (acc. om.) Ez Eze 18:8, Eze 18:13.

definitions.title: r.
definitions.body: = commit, entrust to, c. acc. + [[אֶל־]] pers. Ex 22:6, Ex 22:9 (E), c. [[ל]] pers. Ct So 8:11, c. [[בְּיַד]] Ge 30:35, Ge 39:4, Ge 39:8, Ge 39:22 (all J), 2Sa 10:10.

definitions.title: s.
definitions.body: give over, deliver up, c. acc. Nu 21:3 (JE) Ju Jdg 20:13, 1Sa 11:12, 2Sa 14:7, 2Sa 20:21, 1Ki 14:16, Ho 11:8 ‖[[מִגֵּן]]), Mic 5:2; [[בָּנׇיו פְּלֵיטִים וּבְנׁתָיו בַּשְּׁבִית לְמֶלֶח אֱמׂרִי]] ´[[נ]] Nu 21:29 (JE); + [[ל]], [[לַמָּוֶת]] ´[[פ]] ´[[נ]] Ps 118:18 + [[לִפְנֵי]] De 7:2, De 7:23, De 31:5 + (see Dr:Dt. lxxxiii, No.52, and v. further

definitions.title: 2 b
definitions.body: ad fin.); esp. [[בְּיַד]] ´[[נ]], c. acc., Nu 21:34 (JE) Jos 2:24 (JE) De 2:24 + oft.

definitions.title: t.
definitions.body: yield produce, fruit, etc., esp. of land, ground, Ge 4:12 (J), Le 25:19, Le 26:4, Le 26:20 (all H), De 11:17, Is 55:10 (+ [[ל]] pers.) Zec 8:12, Ps 67:7, Ps 85:13 cf., Ez Eze 36:8; of tree Ez Eze 34:27, Le 26:4, Le 26:20 (H) Ps 1:3, + vine Joe 2:22, vine Zec 8:12; abs. root of righteous yields, [[יִתֵּן]] Pr 12:12 acc. to De Str (dub.; prop. to insert [[פְּרִי]]); Dy Kau Wild prop. [[אֵיתָן]] (as Ps 74:15, etc.), cf. as to sense Ew; other conj. v. Now; cf. Nu 20:8 (P) Zec 8:12, Ct So 1:12, So 2:13, So 7:13.

definitions.title: u.
definitions.body: = occasion, produce, [[שֵׂכֶל טוֹב יִתֶּן־חֵָן]] Pr 13:16 cf., Pr 29:15, [[חֶרְדַּת אָדָם יִתֵּן מוֹקֵשׁ]] v:Pr 29:25 trembling before man occasioneth a snare.

definitions.title: v.
definitions.body: requite to ([[לְ]]) a man, acc. to ([[כְּ]]) character 1Ki 8:39 = 2Ch 6:33, Je 17:10, Je 32:19, Ps 28:4, Ps 28:4; c. [[עַל־]] + [[כְּ]] Ez Eze 7:9; c. [[עַל־]] pers. + acc. of sin Eze 7:3, Eze 7:4, Eze 7:8, Eze 23:49 (cf.

definitions.title: w.
definitions.body: = report, mention, [[אֶל־הַמֶּלֶח]] …[[וַיִּתֵּן אֶת־מִסְפַּר ]] 2Sa 24:9 he reported the number unto the king; [[וׇאֶתְּנׇה לוֹ זְמָָן]] Ne 2:6 and I mentioned to him a time.

definitions.title: x.
definitions.body: = utter, usu. c. acc. [[קוֹל]], utter a sound, lift up the voice: Je 4:16 (+ [[עַל]] against), Je 22:20, Je 48:34, La 2:7; in weeping, [[וַיִּתֵּן אֶת־קׂלוֹ בִּבְכִי]] Ge 45:2 (E), [[וַיִּבְכּוּ]] Nu 14:1 (P); + [[ל]] pers. Pr 2:3 (‖[[לַבִּינׇה תִּקְרָא]]); of wisdom Pr 1:20, Pr 8:1 ‖[[קרא]]; of ´[[י]], esp. in thunder of theoph. Am 1:2, 2Sa 22:14 ‖[[יַרְעֵם]]), = Ps 18:14, Je 25:30, Joe 2:11; of clouds Ps 77:18, the deep Hb Hab 3:10; of young lion's roaring Am 3:4, Je 2:15; of birds Ps 104:12; [[קוֹל]] om., ´[[לְהׂדׂת לְי]] …[[דָּוִד ]] ´[[נ]] 1Ch 16:7; so of ´[[י]]'s voice in thunder, [[לְקוֹל תִתּוֹ]] Je 10:13 (sc. [[קוֹלוֹ]]) at the sound of his uttering (his voice) = Je 51:16; [[בְּקוֹל]] ´[[נ]] Je 12:8 (+ [[עַל־]] against ), of ´[[י]] Ps 46:7, [[תֵן־יִתֵּן בְּקוֹלוֹ קוֹל עׂז]] Ps 68:34; ´[[נ]] with other words, [[אׂמֶר]] v:Ps 68:12 (of ´[[י]]); of confession, (acc. + [[ל]] pers.) Jos 7:19 (JE) Ezr 10:11.

definitions.title: y.
definitions.body: give = stretch out, extend, [[וַיִּתֶּן־יׇד]] Ge 38:28 (J) it put out a hand; [[וַיִּתֵּן חַמַּרְתּוֹ אֶל־בֵּין עֲבוֹתִים]] (read [[עָבוֹת]]) Ez Eze 31:10, Eze 31:14 and it stretched its top amid the clouds.

definitions.title: z.
definitions.body: combinations are: [[יִתֵּן]] [[לְמַכֵּהוּ לֶחִָי]] La 3:30 (humiliation), cf. Is 50:6; [[וַיִּתְּנוּ]] [[כָתֵף סׂרָָרֶת]] Zec 7:11 (of stubbornness), so Ne 9:29 (‖[[עָרְפָּם הִקְשׁוּ]]); also [[וַיִּתְּנוּ עׂרֶף]] 2Ch 29:6 gave, i.e. turned (their) back (on ´[[י]]; ‖[[וַיַּסֵּבּוּ פְנֵיהֶם]] ´[[מִמִּשְׁכַּן י]]); of compact, [[תְּנׇה אֶת־יׇדְֶָ]] 2Ki 10:15 cf., v:2Ki 10:15, so [[מִחְרַיִם נׇתַנּוּ יׇד]] La 5:6; of submission, [[נׇֽתְנׇה]] [[יׇדָהּ]] Je 50:15 = she (Babyl.) hath surrendered; ´[[תְּנוּ יׇד לְי]] 2Ch 30:8 = submit to ´[[י]]; more explicitly, [[יׇד תַּחַת שְׁלֽמהׁ]] ´[[נ]] 1Ch 29:24; [[מָקוֹם לְ]] ´[[נ]] Ju Jdg 20:36 give place to (retire before); of sexual relation, [[לאׁ־תִתֵּן שְׁכָבְתְּ ְלְזׇ֑רַע]] …[[אֶל־אֵשֶׁת ]] Le 18:20 (H), [[וַיִּתֵּן אִישׁ בָּךְ אֶת־שְׁכָבְתּוֹ]] Nu 5:20 (P), so ([[בְּכָל־בְּהֵמָה]]) Le 18:23 (H), cf. Le 20:15 (H).—[[יִתֵּן]] is taken impers. = ‘es giebt,’ there is, there are, in Job 37:10, Pr 10:24, Pr 13:10 by De, citing Ew:§ 295 d, Now:Pr 13:10 Str Frankenb (in transl., dub. in note), Bae:Jb in Kau Ges:§ 144 b; but improb., Kau:Pr Di:Jb, so Hi Bu Du (on Job 37:10), reading [[יֻתַּן]]; cf. Kö:Synt. § 324 d B.
Put, set, nearly = [[שִׂים]], and sts. ‖ with it:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: lit., (esp. oft. in Ez P): c. acc. + [[עַל־]] on, ring on hand Ge 41:42 (E), cf. Ez Eze 16:11, helmet on head 1Sa 17:38, also Je 27:2, Je 28:14 (in fig.), 1Ki 12:4, 1Ki 12:9 (in fig.), 1Ki 18:23 (‖[[שִׂי ם]]), Ex 12:7 (acc. om.), cf. Ex 25:12, Ex 25:26, Ex 25:30 + oft. P; c. [[עַל־]] = above Ex 25:21, Ex 26:34 (P), = for, [[גּׁרָלֽת עַל־]] ´[[נ]] Le 16:8 (P), cast lots for; = against Ez Eze 26:8; c. [[אֶל־]] into: ark into cart 1Sa 6:8, put one in the stocks Je 29:26 (also c. [[עַל־]] Je 20:2), in prison Je 37:18, Je 38:11, cf. Ex 25:16, Ex 28:30 (P); put water upon ([[עַל־]]) sthg. into ([[אֶל־]]) vessel Nu 19:17; = toward [[וַיִּתֵּן פְּנֵי הַצּאׁן]] [[אֶל־עָקׂד]] Ge 30:40 (J; del. Ol Di al.); c. [[בְּ]], cup into hand Ge 40:13 (E), cf. Ju Jdg 7:16, also Ge 41:48 (E), cf. 1Ki 7:51, Ge 1:17 (P), Ge 9:13 (P), 2Ki 19:18, Je 27:8, [[בֶּעָפָר פֶּה]] ´[[נ]] La 3:29 (in fig.), [[נׇתַתִּי שִׁפְחָתִי בְּחֵיקְֶָ]] Ge 16:5 (J), [[וְנׇתַתָּה בְאָזְנוֹ וּבַדֶּלֶת]] De 15:17 and thou shalt put (the awl) into his ear and into the door (pin his ear to the door); put disease into one De 7:15 (‖[[שִׂים]]); inflict blemish ([[מוּם]]) on ([[בְּ]]), Le 24:19, Le 24:20; [[וּכְתׂבֶת קַעֲקַע לאׁ תִתְּנוּ בָּכֶם]] Le 19:28; c. [[בְּ]] + [[לְ]], [[שֶׂרֶט לָנֶפֶשׁ לאׁ תִתְּנוּ בִּבְשַׂרְכֶם]] v:Le 19:28 (all H); c. [[לִטְנֵי]] before, in front of, set food before one, 2Ki 4:43, 2Ki 4:44; cf. Zec 3:9, Ez Eze 3:20, Ex 30:6, Ex 40:5, Ex 40:6 (all P); c. [[בֵּין]] between, Ex 30:18, Ex 40:17 (P); c. [[לְ]], [[לַבַּיִת]] ´[[מִגְרָעוֹת נ]] [[סָבִיב]] 1Ki 6:6 he put ledges to the house; c. other preps. [[הָאִשָּׁה אֲשֶׁר נׇתַתָּ עִמָּדִי]] Ge 3:16 (J), the woman whom thou hast set at my side, cf. Ex 31:6 ([[אִתּוֹ]] ´[[נ]]; fig. of association, assistance); c. [[לִקְרַאת]] Ge 15:10 (J), lay each piece to meet its fellow; he set the sea [[מִכֶּתֶף הַבַּיִת]] 1Ki 7:39; c. [[ה]] loc. put money [[שָׁמָּה]] into it 2Ki 12:10, so of water Ex 30:18 (P), cf. Ex 40:7 ([[שָׁם]]); c. 2 acc. [[אוֹתוֹ בֵּית]] ´[[הַכְּלוּא נ]] Je 37:4 cf. v:Je 37:15; put, place, abs. Ex 40:8 (P; ‖[[שִׂים]], cf. Ex 26:32); set up, [[אֶבֶן מַשְׂכִּית בְּ]] Le 26:1 (H; ‖[[הֵקִים]]); + [[לְ]] pers., lay snare for me Ps 119:110 (in fig.).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: fig., in many phr.: c. [[עַל]], put my spirit upon him Is 42:1, reproach upon one Je 23:40, blessing on Mt. Gerizim, etc., De 11:29, curses on enemies De 30:7; impose tax upon Ne 10:33 cf. 2Ki 23:33; [[נׇתַן הוֹד עַל]] put majesty upon one 1Ch 29:25, Da 11:21, Nu 27:20 (P; [[מֵהוֹד]]; cf. Ps 21:6); so also perh. Ps 8:2 hast set thy majesty upon (over) the heavens, cf. SyrVer Vulgate Targum (rd. [[נׇחַתָּה]] for [[תְּנׇה]], Hup De Pe Bae al.; other views v. in Thes Ew Ol Now Che We Du); = above, [[וּנְתָָנְ ְעֶלְיוֹן עַל־כָּל־גּוֹיֵי הָאָרֶץ]] De 28:1 cf. De 26:19; put (sthg.) over mouth Mic 3:5 (i.e. stop one's mouth, by a gift); = against [[מָחוֹר עַל־]] ´[[נ]] Ez Eze 4:2 (siege), cf. v:Eze 4:2 b; c. [[אֶל־]], [[לְבַקֵּשׁ וָאֶתְּנׇה אֶת־פָּנַי אֶל־]] …[[אֲדׂנׇי ]] Da 9:3; c. [[בְּ]], words into mouth De 18:18, Je 1:9, cf. 1Ki 22:23; wisdom into heart, or person, 1Ki 10:24, Ex 31:6, Ex 36:1, Ex 36:2 (all P), cf. Ps 4:8; set peace in earth Le 26:6 (H); (the idea of) perpetuity ([[עוֹלָם]]) in heart Ec 3:11; a purpose, [[בְּלִבּוֹ]] ´[[וּלהוֹדוֹת נ]] Ex 35:34 (P); [[וְנׇתַתִּי אֶת־יׇדִי]] [[בְּמִחְרַיִם]] Ex 7:4 (P); [[אַל־תִּתֵּן דָּם נׇקִי בְּקֶרֶב עַמְְּ]] De 21:8; [[וַיִּתֵּן חִנּוֹ בְּעֵינֵי]] Ge 39:21 (J), and he put his favour in the eyes of the prison-keeper (made the keeper favourable to him), cf. Ex 3:21, Ex 11:3, Ex 12:36 (all E; cf. also

definitions.title: 1 b, 3 b
definitions.body: ); c. [[בְּ]] pers. = against, in phr. set my face against, oppose Ez Eze 14:8, Eze 15:7, Le 17:10, Le 20:6 (both H); c. [[בֵּין]], = put, i.e. make a covenant between Ge 17:2 (P), cf. Le 26:46 (H); [[אֶרֶץ לִפְנֵיכֶם]] ´[[נ]] i.e. place at your disposal De 1:8, De 1:21 cf. De 2:36; set ordinances, etc., before, [[לִפְנֵי]] (for observance), 1Ki 9:6, Je 26:4, Je 44:10, Da 9:10; blessings and cursings (for choice) De 30:1, De 30:15, De 30:19; ´[[דֶּרֶךְ בְּראׁשׁ פ]] ´[[נ]] set or place one`s way upon his head, i.e. requite him, Ez Eze 9:10, Eze 11:21, Eze 16:43, Eze 22:31 cf. Eze 17:19, also 1Ki 8:32 = 2Ch 6:23 + (cf.

definitions.title: 1 v
definitions.body: ); [[בְּמִדְיׇן]] ´[[לָתֵת נִקְמַת י]] Nu 31:3 to set the vengeance of ´[[י]] upon Midian; ´[[ב]] ´[[נ]] Ps 50:20 = set in, i.e. impute to (usu. ´[[שִׂים ב]]).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: set, appoint, c. acc. + [[עַל־]] over, ´[[י]] hath set a king over you 1Sa 12:13 cf. Ge 41:41 (E); c. [[עַל־]] on, [[ישֵׁב]] ´[[נ]] [[עַל־כִּסְאִי]] 1Ki 1:48; c. [[בְּ]] in = over, 1Ch 12:9, Ne 13:4; c. [[לְ]] Nethînîm [[לַעֲבׂדָה]] Ezr 8:20; c. acc. alone, idol-priest 2Ki 23:5, prophet Je 1:5 (2 acc.), leader Nu 14:4; one instead of ([[תַּחַת]]) another 1Ki 2:35.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: = assign, designate, c. [[לְ]]: God hath assigned victim-flesh to ([[ל]]) you, in order to bear sins of people Le 10:17, cf. Nu 18:8 (both P); cities for ([[ל]]) flight of man-slayer Nu 35:6 (P); [[נׇתַתִּי לָכֶם עַל־הַמִּזְבֵּחַ לְכַפֵּר]] Le 17:11 (H).
Make, constitute,

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: c. 2 acc., [[וְנׇתַתִּי]] [[נְעָרִים שָׂרֵיהֶם]] Is 3:4 and I will make boys their princes, cf. Ge 17:5, Ex 7:l (both P), Ps 18:33 (> [[וַיַּתֵּר]] in ‖ 2Sa 22:33), Ps 39:6, Ps 69:12, Ps 135:12, etc.; + [[בֵּין]] Jos 22:25 (P); + [[אֶל־]] pers. [[וְנׇתַתִּי אֶת־כָּל־אׂיְבֶי ְאֵלֶי ְעׂרֶף]] Ex 23:27 (E), and I will make all thine enemies unto thee a back, i.e. make them shew thee their back, flee from thee, so c. [[לְ]] Ps 18:41 = 2Sa 22:41.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: c. acc. + [[לְ]], [[וְנׇתַתִּי אֶת־יְרוּשָׁלַיִם לְגַלִּים]] Je 9:10 and I will make Jerusalem into ruin-heaps, cf. De 28:13, Is 42:24, Ge 17:6, Ge 17:20, Ge 48:4, Nu 5:21, Jos 17:3 (all P) +; [[לְרַחֲמִים לִפְנֵי]] ´[[פ]] ´[[נ]] 1Ki 8:50 make persons an object of compassion before (in the eyes of), so Ne 1:11, Ps 106:46, Da 1:9 (cf. also

definitions.title: Da 1:1 b, Da 1:2 b
definitions.body: ); + [[לְ]] pers. for (esp. Je.), [[וּנְתַתִּים לִזְוׇעָה לְכׂל]] [[מַמְלְכוֹת הָאָרֶץ]] Je 15:4 and I will make them a terror for all kingdoms of the earth, cf. Je 24:9, Je 29:18, Je 34:17.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: c. acc. + [[כְּ]], [[כַּשִּׁקְמִים]] ´[[וְאֵת הָאֲרָזִים נ]] 1Ki 10:27 and the cedars he made like the sycomores, i.e. as common, = 2Ch 1:15, cf. 1Ki 16:3, Ez Eze 28:6, Le 26:19 (H), Ru 4:11; [[וַיִּתֵּן אׂתָנוּ כִּמְרַגְּלִים]] Ge 42:30 (E), i.e. regarded, treated us as spies, but ins. [[בַּמִּשְׁמָר]] LXX Ol Di Ball Holz,—[[אַל־תִּתֵּן]] [[אֶת־אֲמָֽתְ ְלִפְנֵי בַת בְּלִיַּעַל]] 1Sa 1:16 difficult, (not withstanding Job 3:24, Job 4:19), rd. prob. [[כְּ]] (HPS), or [[לְ]], for [[לִפְנֵי]].

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: rarely c. acc. alone: ´[[וּמִבְּנֵי יִשׂ]] [[שְׁלֽמׂה עֶבֶד]] ´[[לאׁ נ]] 1Ki 9:22 and of the sons of Israel Sol. made no slave, but rd. prob. [[לְמַס עׂבֵד]] (as v:1Ki 9:21; LXXA e)v pra/gma, om. B LXXL; cf. Klo Benz), [[וׇאֶתֵּן עֲלֵיהֶם קְהִלָּה]] Ne 5:7 and I made (held) over their case a great assembly; make a decree, [[חׂק]], Ps 148:6; perh. also [[וַתִּתֵּן אׂתׂת בְּפַרְעׂה]] Ne 9:10 and thou didst perform signs and wonders against 'Pharaoh, etc. (cf. [[שִׂים אוֹתׂת בְּ]] Ex 10:2, Ps 78:43).
be given to (usu. c. [[ל]] pers.):

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: = bestowed upon Jos 24:33 (E), Ez Eze 11:15 (+ [[לְמוֹרָשָׁה]]), Eze 33:24 (+ id.), Job 15:19; Ez Eze 16:34, Nu 26:62 (P), Is 9:5, portion from sacrifice Le 10:14 (P), glory Is 35:2, birthright 1Ch 5:1, freedom Le 19:20 (H).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: given to one ([[ל]]) for wife ([[ל]]) Ge 38:14 (J), 1Sa 18:19.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: provided, usu. c. [[ל]] Ex 5:16, Ex 5:18 (J); 1Sa 25:27, 2Ki 25:30 = Je 52:34, Is 33:16, Ne 13:10; [[מֵרׂעֶה אֶחָד]] ´[[נ]] Ec 12:11 they are given from one shepherd (i.e. words of wise) acc. to Ew De Hi-Now Rüetschi:Kau; Wild underst. subj. of compilers.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: = entrusted to Je 13:20 cf. 2Ch 2:13; c. [[עַל־יׇדָם]] 2Ki 22:7, [[בְּיַד]] 2Ch 34:l6.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: = give into the power of (usu. c. [[בְּיַד]]), esp. of city (kg., people) given into the hand of foe 2Ki 18:30 (+ [[אֶת־]] acc.), 2Ki 19:10 = Is 36:15, Is 37:10, Je 21:10 + 18 t. Je Lv Chr Dn; earth into hand of wicked Job 9:24; in good sense Ge 9:2 (P); delivered to death ([[ל]]), unto lower world ([[אֶל־]]), Ez Eze 31:14; given to us ([[ל]]) for devouring ([[ל]]) Eze 35:12; ´[[חֶרֶב נ]] Ez Eze 32:20 delivered to the sword (del. LXX SyrVer Co Sgfr:Kau Toy); abs., of [[חָבָא]], Da 8:12 (al. was appointed, v. esp. Dr), Da 11:6.

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: of request, be granted to ([[ל]]), Es 2:13, Es 5:3 ([[בַּקָּשָׁה]]), v:Es 5:6, Es 7:2, Es 9:12 (all [[שְׁאֵלָה]]), cf. Es 7:3 ([[בִּשְׁאֵלָה]], [[בְּבַקָּשָׁה]]).

definitions.title: g.
definitions.body: = be permitted Es 9:13 (+ inf.).

definitions.title: h.
definitions.body: = be issued, published (of royal decree), abs. Es 3:5, Es 3:14, Es 4:8, Es 8:13, Es 8:14, Es 9:14; of law given [[בְּיַד משֶׁה]] Ne 10:30.

definitions.title: i.
definitions.body: = be uttered, [[שְׁאוֹן קוֹלָם]] ´[[נ]] Je 51:55 (of stormers of Babylon).

definitions.title: j.
definitions.body: be assigned for ([[ל]]), Ez Eze 47:11.
Be put, set:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: lit., crown [[בְּראׁשׁ]] Es 6:8; of personif. folly [[הַסֶּכֶל בַּמְּרוֹ מִים]] ´[[נ]] Ec 10:6.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: in imagery of Ezek. [[בְּיַרְכְּתֵי־בוֹר]] … ´[[נ]] Ez Eze 32:23, c. [[אֵת]] (with) v:Eze 32:29, c. [[בְּתוֹךְ]] v:Eze 32:25, vine put (cast) [[לָאֵשׁ]] [[לְאָכְלָה]] Ez Eze 15:4 into the fire for consuming; fig. of terror [[בארץ]] ´[[נ]] Eze 32:25.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: = be made, [[בֶּן־אָדָם]] [[חָחִיר יִנׇּתֵן]] Is 51:12.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: = be inflicted, of blemish ([[מוּם]]) Le 24:20 (c. [[בְּ]] pers.). †

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: (or

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: be given, bestowed, abs. Nu 26:54; c. [[לְ]] pers. 2Ki 5:17, Nu 32:5 ([[אֶת־]] c. acc.; both P); in exchange for ([[תַּ֫חַת]]) Job 28:15.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: = be given to one ([[ל]]) for wife ([[ל]]) 1Ki 2:21 (Abishag, [[אֶת־]] c. acc.).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: = be given, delivered, up to ([[ל]]) 2Sa 21:6.
be put upon ([[עַל־]]) Le 11:38 (P); of Absalom ´[[וַיֻּתַּן בֵּין הַשָּׁמַיִם וגו]] 2Sa 18:9, < [[וַיִּתָּל]] (√ [[תלה]]) LXX SyrVer We Dr (?), Klo Kit Bu HPS.
